DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the definitive bioequivalence of tablets of MK0524A (1000 mg Extended Release (ER) Niacin/ 20 mg laropiprant) from two sources.
DOC.criteria: Subject is in good health Subject is willing to follow all study guidelines Subject has or has a history of any disease or condition that might confound the results of the study or make participation unsafe
